Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Editorial board member of Annals of Applied Statistics. http://imstat.org/aoas/editorial_board.html
Editorial board member of Journal of Applied Econometrics. http://onlinelibrary.wile y.com/journal/10.1002/(ISSN)1099-1255/ho mepage/EditorialBoard.html
Editorial board member of Studies in Nonlinear Dynamics and Econometrics. https://www.degruyter.com/view/j/snde
Editorial board member of International Journal of Forecasting. http://www.journals.elsevi er.com/international-journal-of-forecast ing/editorial-board

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Presented and invited at several international conferences, workshops, central banks and university seminar series, including, as example of quality over years: - the 63th European Meeting of the Econometric Society (https://www.econometricsociety.org/cont ent/european-meeting-milan-august-27-31- 2008) - National Bureau of Economic Research Summer Institute 2011 "Forecasting & Empirical Methods in Macroeconomics & Finance" Workshop (http://conference.nber.org/confer/2011/SI2011/EFWW/EFWWprg.html) [invited speaker, cost covered by the host institution]; - 2011 CFS, the European Central Bank and Deutsche Bundesbank seminar series (https://www.ifk-cfs.de/events/archive/2011.html) [invited speaker; cost covered by the host institutions]; - 2012 Deutsche Bundesbank workshop on "Uncertainty and Forecasting in Macroeconomics" (https://www.bundesbank.de/Redaktion/EN/ Termine/Research_centre/2012/2012_06_01_ eltville.html) [invited speaker, cost covered by the host institution]; - 2013 Allied Social Science Associations (https://www.aeaweb.org/conference/2013/preliminary.php); - 9th Annual CIRANO-CIREQ Workshop on Data Revision in Macroeconomic Forecasting and Policy (https://www.cirano.qc.ca/conferences/realtime2013); - the 2015 Stevanovich Center for Financial Mathematics at University of Chicago conference on Market Microstructure and High Frequency data (http://math.uchicago.edu/~cfm/mm2015.htm) [invited speaker, cost covered by the host institution]; - 2015 World Congress of the Econometric Society (https://www.econometricsociety.org/meet ings/schedule/2015/08/17/2015-world-congress); - 9th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics (CFE 2015) (http://www.cfenetwork.org/CFE2015/index.php) - the 69th European Meeting of the Econometric Society (https://www.econometricsociety.org/meet ings/schedule/2016/08/22/2016-european-meeting) - 2016 Econometric Institute Erasmus University Rotterdam seminar series (https://www.eur.nl/ese/english/departme nts/department_of_econometrics/research/ seminars_in_econometrics/schedule_fall_2 016/) [invited speaker, cost covered by EUR];
Organizer of Norges Bank conference on "Modeling and Forecasting Oil Prices". http://www.norges-bank.no/en/about/Resea rch/Conferences/2012-Modeling-and-foreca sting-oil-prices/
Organizer of ECB and Norges Bank joint workshop on "Monetary Policy and Commodity Prices". http://www.ecb.europa.eu/pub/conferences/html/201211_mopo_commodity.en.html
Organizer of CAMP workshop on "Oil and Macroeconomics". http://www.bi.edu/ForskningFiles/CAMP/CAMP%20workshop%2024-05-2013%20(1).pdf
Organizer of the "4th Annual ESOBE meeting". Keynote speakers: Chris Sims (Nobel Laureate 2011), Tilmann Gneiting. http://www.norges-bank.no/en/about/Research/Conferences/2013-ESOBE/

Organizer of the "23rd Annual Symposium of the Society for Nonlinear Dynamics and Econometrics". Keynote speakers: James Stock and Martin Eichenbaum. http://www.norges-bank.no/e n/about/Research/Conferences/SNDE-Confer ence-2015/
Organizer of University of Melbourne workshop on "Bayesian Analysis and Modeling Summer Workshop". http://fbe.unimelb.edu.au/economics/bam/ bayesian_workshop/BAM-summer-workshop-2015
Organizer of Free University of Bozen/Bolzano workshop on "Forecasting in Finance and Macroeconomics". https://next.unibz.it/en/events/119459 -forecasting-in-finance-and-macroeconomics
Organizer of the "7th Annual ESOBE meeting". Keynote speakers: Christian Roberto, Ulrich Müller and Thomas Sargent (Nobel Laureate 2011). http://virgo.unive.it/esobe2016/

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Norges Bank project to build a system for the short-term forecasting of the Norwegian Economy http://www.norges-bank.no/en/Monetary- policy/Models-for-monetary-policy-analysis-and-forecasting/SAM/
Coordinator and responsible of Norges Bank project Commodities, foreign factors and the Norwegian economy http://www.norges-bank.no/pages /95611/Economic%20Commentaries_2013_3.pdf
Coordinator and responsible of Norges Bank project Identification and forecasting of Norwegian business cycles
Partner responsible for the Bank of England, Norges Bank and University of Warwick project PRObability FORecasting (PROFOR) toolbox http://www2.warwick.ac.uk/fac/soc/wbs/subjects/emf/profor/
Ricerca commissionata da Europe Energy (http://www.europe-energy.it/it/) sul progetto "Modelli econometrici per lo studio dei prezzi del mercato elettrico europeo"

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Marie Curie Early Stage Training fellowship at Manchester Business School, University of Manchester
Research Associates to Center for Applied Macroeconomic Analysis, Australian National University, Canberra, Australia. https://cama.crawford.anu.edu.au/about-cama/research-associates
Member of the American Economic Association
Member of the International Society for Bayesian Analysis

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: PhD program at BI Norwegian Business School, Oslo, Norway
Member of the PhD Collegio (32nd Cycle and following ones) Faculty of Economics and Management, Free University of Bozen/Bolzano

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: De Nederlandsche Bank (DNB), the Central Bank of The Netherlands, Visiting Scholar Programme
Department of Economics, BI Norwegian Business School
Joint organized and invited lecturer at 2014 Study Center Gerzensee Central Bankers Courses on "Monetary Policy and Commodity Prices"

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Researcher at Norges Bank, the Central Bank of Norway
Senior Researcher at Norges Bank, the Central Bank of Norway
Researcher II (associate professor) at Department of Economics at BI Norwegian Business School
Adjunct Professor at Department of Economics at BI Norwegian Business School
Principal Researcher at Norges Bank, the Central Bank of Norway

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Computational and Financial Econometrics (CFE) Network. http://www.cfenetwork.org/members.php

Resaercher and Visiting Professor at Centre for Applied Macro and Petrolium Economics, BI Norwegian Business School, Oslo Norway. http://www.bi.edu/research/bi-r esearch-centre-for-applied-macro--and-pe troleum-economics-camp/

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: EUROSTAT Project 50102.2009.001-2010.353 – Principal European Economic Indicators (PEEIs) Lot 2 – Advanced statistical and econometric techniques for PEEIs
EUROSTAT Project Database management and research activities related to the production of Principle European Economic Indicators (PEEIS), Unit C4: Key indicators for European policies
